function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased HVAC loads for 2020 compared to 2018 under equivalent weather conditions","Impact":"Higher energy consumption and potential strain on HVAC systems","Mitigation":"Implement energy-efficient practices and upgrade HVAC systems","Technologies":"Smart thermostats, energy-efficient HVAC systems","People":"Residents and building owners in Austin, TX","Owner":"Property owners, energy management companies"},{"Description":"Variation in HVAC use due to differences in setpoints adjusted by homeowners","Impact":"Inconsistent energy consumption and strain on HVAC systems","Mitigation":"Educate homeowners on energy-efficient temperature settings and provide smart thermostat options","Technologies":"Smart thermostats, energy-efficient HVAC systems","People":"Homeowners in Austin, TX","Owner":"Energy management companies, local authorities"},{"Description":"Unexpected patterns in HVAC use in August compared to other months","Impact":"Inefficient energy use and potential strain on HVAC systems","Mitigation":"Conduct further analysis and investigate factors influencing HVAC usage patterns in August","Technologies":"Data analysis tools, energy monitoring systems","People":"Researchers, energy analysts","Owner":"Research institutions, energy management companies"}]}
